TopicTitle: So I guess everybody is going to Laythe today..

Articles.Content:
I went there for the first time.. nicely aerobreaked at Jool at 115 km, probably could have gone down to 110 to circularize. So to Laythe, first time there and i guess I took a bit of a detour..

^^ dufuq just happened??

Anyway i was lucky and managed to land my Eve rover that i previously landed on Duna nicely on one of the tiny islands..
One time I was flying my first craft to Laythe and landed it on the night side... The thing is, I landed on a tiny island.
